content: yarn bulky approximately 75 grams needle size 10 1/2 - or size needed to match gauge gauge 13 st = 4 inches notions 14 buttons - either 1/4 inch craft buttons or larger for better to see you with eyes * note * pattern has been edited in the past but it has been reported that a few people still perceive errors in the crown decreases this is a free pattern and will not be edited further as i do not have the time to do so you can use any decrease method you choose once you get to that point many videos and how-to items exist about this so find one that works for you to knit this pattern you should be familiar with hat patterns and figuring out the decreases on your own i cannot respond to individual requests for edits etc thank you
